TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2LOSNBWAction, TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2LOSNGBWAction, TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2NBWAction, TemporalTesterActions.QPTL2NGBWAction
public abstract class AbstractTranslationAction<F extends Logic,T extends Automaton>
extends LogicAction<F,T>

A TranslationAction takes a translator as a parameter and uses the translator to translate formulae. The name of this action depends on the translator.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
See Also:
Serialized Form
